title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A 
- Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State 
from Certain States) (No. 5) (Amendment) (No. 4) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 31st day of October
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (restrictions upon travel state certain states) (no 5) (amendment) (no 4) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 31st day october

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the Health Act
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the Health Act 
1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Restrictions upon 
Travel to the State from Certain States) (No. 5) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 135 
of 2021).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (restrictions upon travel state certain states) (no 5) regulation 2021 (s.i no 135 2021)

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 3. Regulation 1 of the Principal Regulations is amended, in paragraph (3),
text_raw:
3. Regulation 1 of the Principal Regulations is amended, in paragraph (3), 
by the substitution of “8th day of November 2021” for “31st day of October 
2021”.
text_norm: 3 regulation 1 principal regulation amended paragraph (3) substitution 8th day november 2021 31st day october 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 4. Part 3 of the Principal Regulations is revoked.
text_raw:
4. Part 3 of the Principal Regulations is revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [566] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 October, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [566]

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations serve to extend the effective date of S.I. No. 135 of 2021 
until 8th November 2021. In addition, Part 3 of S.I. No. 135 of 2021 is revoked. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [566] 5
